 https://www.patreon.com/joshuafluke

Recruiters are officially inventing new Olympic events — and candidates keep losing by existing.

Today’s episode includes:
• Getting rejected because you didn’t reschedule an interview… while your wife was literally in labor
• Being judged as unemployable because you don’t keep scissors in your kitchen
• Recruiters discovering halfway through the hiring process that they don’t actually know what they’re hiring for
• Candidates being labeled “underconfident” when they’re really just exhausted, broke, and trying to survive

Somehow
title: RECRUITERS ON LINKEDIN ARE CLUELESS!
